django_utils.templatetags package¶

Submodules¶

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils module¶

Template tags

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.checked(value, dic)[source]¶

Returns ‘ checked’ if the value is in the dictionary :param value: the value of the input :param dic: a list of all values :returns: ‘ checked’ string if value is present in the dic

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.date_tag(time, fmt='%m.%d.%Y', text='')[source]¶

Returns an HTML5 time tag with the correct date format :param time: the time :param fmt: the python format :param text: (optional) the text you want displayed in the tag :returns: formatted html time tag

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.external_link(url, text='', klass='')[source]¶

Returns a formatted link to an external URL :param url: the url to link to :param text: (optional) the text you want displayed in the link :param klass: (optional) the class you want applied to the link :returns: formatted link to an external site

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.external_link_or_default(url, text, min_length)[source]¶

Returns an external link :param url: URL to link to :param text: text you want displayed :param min_length: the min_length of the url :returns: formatted HTML string

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.on_class(value, dic)[source]¶

Returns ‘class=”on”’ if the value is in the dictionary :param value: the value of the input :param dic: a list of all values :returns: ‘class=”on”’ string if value is present in the dic

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.per_page_range(parser, token)[source]¶

Returns a PerPageNode

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.phone_number(text, delimeter='-')[source]¶

Returns phone number from a string

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.time_tag(time, fmt='%b. %e, %Y %I:%M %p', text='', attr_fmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')[source]¶

Returns an HTML5 time tag with the correct date format

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.times(count)[source]¶

Returns a range of a given integer

django_utils.templatetags.django_utils.url_replace(request, field, value)[source]¶

Method for replacing fields in the URL string
